item.title: Sauron's Powers In The Lord Of The Rings Fully Explained
item.description: Sauron's powers are explored in The Lord of the Rings movies and The Rings of Power, but only Tolkien's lore provides answers on their true nature.

item.title: Jack Blackâ€™s New Comedy Movie Returns Him To An Unexpected Genre 18 Years After His $206M Kate Winslet Rom-Com
item.description: The new Jack Black comedy movie is his first entry in a surprising subgenre since his romantic comedy with Kate Winslet from nearly 20 years ago.

item.title: Fast & Furious' Hobbs Spinoff Gets Carefully Uncertain Update From Writer
item.description: Red One writer Chris Morgan offers a cautious update on Dwayne Johnson's Hobbs spinoff and its potential role in the Fast & Furious franchise.
